message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a significant discount from my initial asking price, and I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to you.  Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925,000. Can you consider this price?
Bob,  $925,000 is a good offer, but I'm still holding out for a little bit more.  How about $940,000? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I understand your position, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to go up to $920,000, but no more. Can you meet me at this price?
